text:
*Bring back the ability to use HubL Tags in the blog content module.*

The sudden dropping of this feature is frustrating. Us devs used that to add features to the blog that didnâ€™t already exist. Now we have to resort to hacks to do the same thing - that only hurt marketers.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-back-support-for-the-use-of-HubL-tags-inside-of-the-blog/idi-p/259774#M31488>

Does anyone know what the status of this is? It says "in planning" but it's also a 2-year-old thread and I couldn't find any other information on it <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/IF-branches-reconnection/idi-p/11322#comments>
